item.title: CVE-2013-4187|2024-08-06T16:38:01.473Z -- flippy -- flippy
item.description: The Flippy module 7.x-1.x before 7.x-1.2 for Drupal does not properly restrict access to nodes, which allows remote authenticated users with the permission to access content to read a link or alias to a restricted node.
